definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on
to warn repeatedly/to urge/to exhort again and again
to entrust a task to sb else
repeatedly urging/imploring over and over again
to follow the doctor's advice/as instructed by the physician

sentences.english: You'd better consult the exposure meter if you be not sure of the time for exposure.
sentences.chinese: 如果你囑不準曝光時間，最好查一下曝光表。

sentences.english: A postoperative semirigid cervical collar was prescribed for 2 months.
sentences.chinese: 手術後囑患者2個月內戴半剛性的頸託。

sentences.english: Ask client to remove hearing aid and close eyes.
sentences.chinese: 囑受檢者取下助聽器，閉眼。

sentences.english: Tip reality to reveal the son duong district will survive a disaster, instructed the people beware.
sentences.chinese: 妙法真人透露山陽縣將有災劫，囑百姓加倍小心。

sentences.english: Have client open eyes, and note blink reflex.
sentences.chinese: 囑受檢者睜眼，注重瞬目反射。

sentences.english: The doctor told me to make two tablets before every meal.
sentences.chinese: 醫生囑我每頓飯前服兩片藥。

sentences.english: She summons her page and sends Octavian the silver rose.
sentences.chinese: 她招來隨從，囑他將銀玫瑰交給奧克塔維伯爵。

sentences.english: Instruct client to look straight ahead toward you, keeping head motionless throughout examination.
sentences.chinese: 囑病人直視檢查者，檢查期間頭部保持不動。

sentences.english: ShaoZheng nodded, and told him all the way to be careful.
sentences.chinese: 邵正點頭稱是，囑他一路小心。

definition: to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)
rich/abundant/exuberant/to add for free/to throw in as bonus/to spare/to forgive/despite/although
to give as a present/to repel/to bestow an honorary title after death (old)
to respect/to admire/to venerate/by the emperor himself
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
poetic essay/taxation/to bestow on/to endow with
to carry/to take along/to bring along/to hold (hands)/also pr. [xi1]
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
